solution_correctness.description: Accuracy of the final answer provided by the system.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to track and understand the reasoning process of the agents.

data_verification.description: The capability to check and confirm the validity of data used in reasoning.

handling_ambiguity.description: The system's proficiency in managing and clarifying ambiguous information.

execution_efficiency.description: Efficiency in terms of time and computational resources used to produce the solution.

error_detection.description: The system's ability to detect and address errors during the task.

robustness.description: The system's capacity to handle diverse and unexpected inputs or scenarios.
